titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Mount Aboo [Ä€bu] to Leslie Saunders

mods.abstract: Letter regarding the recent heavy rain in Ajmer and the condition of the roads as a consequence. The letter also discusses a request to William Arden Crommelin for payment for the Ajmer fort wall and looking into repairing the [water] tank at Happy Valley for use as a Soldier's bath.
